name: Hau ab aber schnell!!! 1Player (Remastered)
description:
Play the original Game here: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/25328139/

This is one of my first games I created, well I wasnt really coding, but now I can and so I decided to do a Remastered Edition of it.

This is my first game with my own Engine and it will be done in Java. Well its obviously not the best game, its more a private award I give to my past self. 

So if its coming out, just try it and compare it to the old version.

The game will be made in Java.

Remind: You dont need Java to run the game, I convert the game to a normal EXE to make it accessible to everyone without having issues.
